data.eml:eml: Genus Lecithocera of Thailand. Part IV. Descriptions of three new species and notes on a little known species (Lepidoptera: Lecithoceridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Park, Kyu-Tek (2009): Genus Lecithocera of Thailand. Part IV. Descriptions of three new species and notes on a little known species (Lepidoptera: Lecithoceridae). Zootaxa 2208: 58-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275137
